TextView.android:text: Once there was a clever fox in a jungle.Oneday , when the fox was walking through jungle ,he fell into a trap .He could somehow get out of the trap ,but he had to leave his tail behind.Without a tail , he looked strange and he felt sad.But the fox was clever and he made a plan.He invited all the foxes to come to a meeting .All of them came Then the fox without a tail said,'My dear friends, listen to what i say.I have discovered a new thing , that is the tails of ours are not useful.They look ugly and always remain dirty. So, we shuold cut off our tails. All the foxes listened to the clever fox and agreed with him.One of the wise old foxes was listening too.He said,'My friend, your plan is very interesting but foolish. You have no tail.So you want us to cut off our tails, because you have lost your own tail.' Without a tail you are looking so strange and ugly.'Everyone agreed with the old wise fox.As the cunning fox failed to convince them, he left the place at once.
